nodes.bodyText: There's lots of other calculations in this class that are used to determine where to spawn a Cat. I didn't want to make a large patch to bypass that code, so I just stuck it in the spawnCat method.

Same for PatrolSpawner. func_230253_a_ is the main method that is used to determine if a Patrol can spawn. I just hooked into spawnPatroller at the very end to look at the end result if the game decides it wants to spawn a Patrol or not.
